title: Traditional Naturopathy, Crystal Honeycutt
cleaned_text: Meet Crystal Crystal is a Clinical Herbalist and a Traditional Naturopath. She is a member of the American Herbalist Guild and holds an educational doctorate in Naturopathy, and a graduate level certificate in Clinical Herbalism. She also holds a bachelors in holistic nutrition, along with higher education from University of Integrated Science California and Elon University. Crystal is a certified Midwife Assistant, and trained in Metabolic Typing and Emotional Healing techniques. Her special interests include: holistic pediatrics, integrative emotional health, autism, and life-style medicine.
